sentence.text: While examining pedigrees of JEB patients with negative regulation of cold-induced thermogenesis mutations, we observed that heterozygous carriers of functional null mutations displayed subtle enamel pitting in the absence of skin fragility or other JEB symptoms.
The reported enamel abnormality in negative regulation of cold-induced thermogenesis mutation carriers could be attributed to a half dose effect of the laminin Î±3 chain (haploinsufficiency)
